# masthead_user (Data Source)

Fetch information about a Masthead user



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) Email address of the user

### Read-Only

- `role` (String) Role of the user (supported values: USER, OWNER)
